name: uilint-monorepo
description: AI-powered UI consistency checker for Next.js applications
author: Peter Suggate

scripts.build:packages: pnpm --filter uilint-core build && pnpm --filter uilint-react build && pnpm --filter uilint build && pnpm --filter uilint-eslint build && pnpm --filter uilint-mcp build && pnpm --filter jsx-loc-plugin build
scripts.clean: pnpm -r --workspace-concurrency=1 exec -- sh -c "rm -rf dist tsconfig.tsbuildinfo .turbo .next coverage node_modules/.cache || true"
scripts.version:patch: pnpm --filter 'uilint*' exec npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && pnpm --filter jsx-loc-plugin exec npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && pnpm sync:workspace
scripts.version:minor: pnpm --filter 'uilint*' exec npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && pnpm --filter jsx-loc-plugin exec npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && pnpm sync:workspace
scripts.version:major: pnpm --filter 'uilint*' exec npm version major --no-git-tag-version && pnpm --filter jsx-loc-plugin exec npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm version major --no-git-tag-version && pnpm sync:workspace
scripts.publish:dry: pnpm sync:workspace && pnpm build:packages && pnpm --filter uilint-core publish --dry-run --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter uilint-react publish --dry-run --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter uilint publish --dry-run --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter uilint-eslint publish --dry-run --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter uilint-mcp publish --dry-run --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter jsx-loc-plugin publish --dry-run --no-git-checks
scripts.publish:packages: pnpm sync:workspace && pnpm build:packages && pnpm --filter uilint-core publish --access public --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter uilint-react publish --access public --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter uilint publish --access public --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter uilint-eslint publish --access public --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter uilint-mcp publish --access public --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter jsx-loc-plugin publish --access public --no-git-checks
